content.description: The following question refers to the topic of the Cold War and contemporary Europe.
content.question: Which of the following accurately explains why the Cold War heightened the sense of anxiety in European culture?

choices.label: Cold War politics empowered right-wing authoritarian governments and political movements in Western Europe.
Resurgent nationalism during the Cold War brought on fears of a return to the genocidal practices of the Nazi regime.
The nuclear arms race between the United States and the Soviet Union brought about fears of a catastrophic conflict.
Increasing arms expenditures on both sides of the Cold War strained budgets and hampered economic development.

content.answer: The nuclear arms race between the United States and the Soviet Union brought about fears of a catastrophic conflict.

topic.text: 9.1: Contextualizing Cold War and Contemporary Europe
